mapper.insert: insert into jy_apply (id, open_id, student_id, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, open_id, student_id, status from jy_apply

select a.id, a.open_id, a.status, s.name, s.sex, s.identity, s.family_id, s.poor_id, s.village, s.group from jy_student s join jy_apply a where s.id = a.student_id and s.name like #{name} and status in (1,2)
